data.summary_suggestion: Fill PDF template with provided data
data.description_suggestion: Fills a PDF template with the provided data values. Accepts a template ID and a FillTemplateRequest containing the data to populate into the template fields. Returns the filled PDF document. This operation modifies the template instance by applying the submitted data to generate a completed PDF.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of available PDF templates. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters. Returns a ResponseOk_List_Template__ object containing template metadata including template IDs, names, and other template properties. No authentication required for listing templates.
